alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Lipscomb; Ochiltree; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 4:55PM CDT until August 13 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northwestern Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... Central Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Farnsworth, or 5 miles southwest of Perryton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Perryton, Lipscomb, Wolf Creek Park, Glazier, and Farnsworth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
